function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Examination of the effect of implementing prevention methods on different types of buildings may lead to the spread of contagious diseases if the methods are not effective or if the buildings are not properly managed.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases spreading and outbreaks in buildings of varying risk categories.","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and validation of the effectiveness of the prevention methods, proper implementation and management of control measures, and regular monitoring of building conditions.","Technologies":"Advanced building management systems, IoT devices for monitoring, ventilation and air quality control technologies.","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, building owners, public health authorities.","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, public health authorities."}]}
